message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.LO, cs.PL. 

The paper discusses a method for formal specification of fault tolerant systems, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). It also deals with faults and errors, which are relevant to computer security (cs.CR). The concept of layering and modeling abnormal behavior can be related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and logic in computer science (cs.LO). Finally, the paper mentions the use of Rely/Guarantee reasoning, which is a technique used in programming languages and compilers (cs.PL).
